help.title: Help
help.gapfill: Type the word you hear. Correct letters turn green.
help.system: We show the correct spelling and definition; confirm to proceed.

tutorial.title: Quick Tutorial
tutorial.1: Listen to the story audio at the top. You can pause and seek.
tutorial.2: Type directly into the blanks. Press Enter to Check.
tutorial.3: Green means correct. Red means try again.
tutorial.4: Need help? Use the Hint button or Ctrl/Cmd+H.

teacherHelp.title: Student Instructions (based on selected language)
teacherHelp.previewReadonly: Inputs are read-only here; students type answers in their session.
